display.title: Start here!
description: Hello! You're probably looking to set up &&abasic ore processing&&r. This quest line will try to guide you through the necessary motions. As always, it's &&6important&&r to make the disclaimer that this isn't the only &&o"meta"&&r way to process your ores - a strong ore processing facility will treat each ore depending on the demands of your &&bGregTech&&r factory. We emphasise that you shouldn't take this guide as gospel.

subtitle.text: From one Ore, a great many dusts shall flow...
